item.title: A Video Illustration on How a Portable Oxygen Concentrator Works
item.description:
A Video Illustration on How a Portable Oxygen Concentrator Works

View inside a portable oxygen concentrator and see how it turns air into breathable, medical grade oxygen. Learn more here: http://www.oxygenconcentratorstore.com/reference-material/how-concentrators-work/

item.title: Company:
item.description:
Company:

DLG Mechatronics is a subsidiary company of Pro Vita Group, which is one of the leaders in Poland in the range of implementation of advanced and innovative systems for medical fields including pulmonology, medical imaging, neurosurgical intraoperative navigation and 3D endoscopic imaging. Over 14 years of experience resulted in establishment of a special purpose entity for realization of Research & Development of innovative medical products.
